website_summaries.verdict: These chimes are more decorative than functional. Buy them for their looks, not sound quality.
pros: Offers a beautiful and gentle sound in an attractive bronze finish with nice woodwork
As sturdy as a small set of chimes can be
cons: Needs considerable wind to be heard and the sound is high-pitched
The set is small, making it more delicate and fragile than bigger ones

customer_reviews.title: Ominous tones
customer_reviews.text: The hanging ring was missing. I checked the box thoroughly and did not find it. This is a pretty small detail though. I like that the sound is very different than average wind chimes, however, it has a more ominous sound than I expected from the preview video.
customer_reviews.author: veroneeeeca

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These chimes sound beautiful. They're still fairly high-pitched, but low enough to not be annoying if you don't prefer the chirpy ones. They aren't very big, but luckily it doesn't take away from the sound at all!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen S.

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best, but don't leave them outside all year...
customer_reviews.text: The best of the best, but don't leave them outside all year... I live in Hawaii, and take these outside when I want to hear them, and bring them in (when I remember!) when we are not on the deck. Heavy UV and strong winds will wear-down any wind chime. While well-made, Woodstocks are not as durable as the price indicates. You buy them for the superb sound. Take care of them like a musical instrument, and they last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Waikiki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for well over a year now. They are still beautiful. Color is unchanged. Strings are still strong and intact. The sound is beautiful especially for the price and size. I ended up buying a second set from this manufacturer because the first ones were so lovely. These would make fabulous gifts. They are packaged very nicely for shipping. And arrive very quickly. You can't go wrong buying chimes from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!  VERY WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of wind chimes from the same company. My first one is still outside, still chimes and has not fallen apart, nor has the strings rotted in the weather. I also own their sundial. Do yourself a favor and go on this company's website to see all the chimes they make. A little pricey? Yes, but they will last and besides, they guarantee all their products--not for a year or two, but for LIFE! Where can you find that kind of a guarantee?
customer_reviews.author: Marlene R.

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Took a bit of a gamble but amazing ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Took a bit of a gamble but amazing feature to be able to hear them in action on the site. That definitely helped me make my choice. They’re pretty loud but I also am a city dweller who has them on my fire escape right outside my window so I get the front row seat to the show. My neighbors may hate me but I think they are mostly magical, except during hurricane strength winds at night.
customer_reviews.author: thalassa

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Woodstock makes such a great product. I'm never dissatisfied with it. I have some hand chimes that are absolutely spectacular that I use for energy clearing and that's what prompted me to buy this lovely wind chime. I'm so glad I did! I've been looking for a wind chime for a long time and even though I live near patio and gift shops that carry many of them, nothing really compared to the quality of this chime at such a reasonable price point. I highly recommend this mellow, sensitive chime...it hangs on my front porch and invites lovely, positive chi into my home!
customer_reviews.author: caliartist

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful music in the garden
customer_reviews.text: This last year I have been working on redoing our flower garden. We placed an emphasis on attracting butterflies and hummingbirds. The garden is beautiful, but was missing something. This was it. Unlike cheaper chimes I have tried in the past, the music from these is more ethereal. I love these and plan to add another set from this series. I just need to find a place to hang them as the garden is more sheltered and doesn't get as much wind so spots are limited.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Harness

customer_reviews.title: Very charming! Pretty higher-pitched windchime— would be a nice accent to larger chimes
customer_reviews.text: It produces a gentle, pleasant sound—but I feel if you placed this wind chime in the open and you live where stronger winds are common it might be a little piercing; just an uneducated guess. If you place it where it’s not getting moved around abruptly it’s very, very tranquil. It’s a smaller medium in size so big gusts might not be ideal. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Huckins

customer_reviews.title: Very Small and Cheap String (no ring or hook in both of mine)
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the photos fool you. Mine is a little less than 17" from the very top of the looped string down to the end of the dropper. It didn't come with a ring or hook..just string. Shocked at how small this chime is. You can buy similar sized chimes at Walmart for $5.99. I have one and the quality of string is exactly the same, however, the Woodstock Chimes are better quality tubing. Next time, I'll just pick up a themed chime at a big box store.
customer_reviews.author: gator1fan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Clear Sound
customer_reviews.text: My son has this particular windchime. Was at his home recently and heard it on a slightly breezy evening and loved the sound so had to buy my own, plus one for my sister in Illinois. I absolutely LOVE the sound of this windchime. It is so clear and beautiful. Makes me happy to hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna J. Carey

customer_reviews.title: ... for a friend as a gift and was actually disappointed because it actually appeared larger in the picture than ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wind chime for a friend as a gift and was actually disappointed because it actually appeared larger in the picture than what it was when I received it but at least I didn't receive it all messed up and parts of it broken like the BWINKA Chinese Traditional Amazing 4 Tubes 5 Bells Bronze Yard Garden Outdoor Living Wind Chimes 60cm that I received in the same box/package that they both came in.
customer_reviews.author: Joy P. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Woodstock makes great windchimes
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this set as a gift. Everyone I've given Woodstock chimes has enjoyed them. I personally own several of their products and I love how my yard gently sings. All of their crimes are tuned, so they have a theme to the notes they produce. It's not just random sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Roadie jim

customer_reviews.title: Simple and basic
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice chime but definitely a big step down from the "tuned" style chimes Woodstock is so well known for. I would call this a "tinkle" style in that each tube has a nice enough sound but the tubes don't relate to each other well for matched pitch or specific notes that are less interesting to listen to. It is quite inexpensive and does exactly what it is supposed to while looking good. Good materials with real wood with a good finish and metal parts that have not rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Cheff Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound and Quality-Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for a family member. She was thrilled- she loved the sound, quality and appearance of the chimes. Woodstock chimes make great gifts and I own more than one Woodstock wind chime myself. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jim and Denise H

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Chimes That Don't Work
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous chimes that absolutely do not work under normal circumstances. Hung them for a few days in what I'd consider a good light to moderate breeze and they never chimed a single time. The tail moved a lot, but they never chimed. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Frensley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound coming out of this set of chimes
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound coming out of this set of chimes. Has a nice mid-range tone, pleasant and not too high pitched. Takes a bit of breeze or my Texas flag blowing up against it to set them off, so you get a pleasant occasional chimes without driving the neighbors or me crazy by ringing too often. Only rings when the wind means it. I like that in a wind chime. It lets you know when a front is coming in or rain is on the way. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tom King

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, Woodstock Chimes are amazing! We completed the entire set of the planetary chimes and just love how they all sound together in the wind. We ordered extras in the small Mars and Mercury set so as to have more lighter notes. It truly is lovely to listen to. If you love a wind chime that sounds like music and not just clanking metal tinkling in the wind, you're going to love these!
customer_reviews.author: Wagner713Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: Sounds lovely...deeper tones than others I have...liked it so much I bought one for my boyfriends home and each of my nieces ,also my brother recently...will buy many more of these high quality Woodstock chimes
customer_reviews.author: DR MOUSE

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend Mars chimes. You’ll love them !!
customer_reviews.text: Very unique sound to these chimes. Beautiful “ lonely” Martian sound to them, not overly loud - neighbor friendly as I live in a townhouse. It did not come w a ring to hang off so i used a key ring - works like a charm. 14” chimes w an absolutely beautiful sound. Highly recommend these Mars chimes !!
customer_reviews.author: My Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great looks; chimes with strong wind
customer_reviews.text: These chimes are beautiful to look at. When it comes to sound, it sounds pretty (in the minor), but rings only with a strong wind. First of all, the striker is a ball and not a disk. It takes a really strong wind to make it touch the pipes. So, with a strong wind you will occasionally hear it ring. It still sounds great, no cheap clanking whatsoever. Usually 2-3 notes at a time. Surprisingly rich for a chime with just five tubes. I hang it only on very windy days, that's the only way to hear it ring.
customer_reviews.author: B.V.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chimes, peaceful and soothing, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound from these Woodstock chimes is amazing. I have bought several windchimes over the years, and this set is by far my favorite. I love the peaceful sound that actually sounds like music and not metal banging together. It is made very nicely, and is attractive. I am looking to purchase an additional one for the backyard as well.
customer_reviews.author: ggnew

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPLY MADE
customer_reviews.text: ( CRAP) terrible sound if any, worth about $5 or less very disappointed hangs by string so u know it will break , too cheap to put a 10 cent hook on it to hang from= junk
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Woodstock 17 Inch Mars Wind Chime
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a little better made. The tone is pretty nice but I don't know how long it will last at the cemetery on my Dad & Mom's Head Stone. I should have purchased a little higher end chime.
customer_reviews.author: Hammercl

customer_reviews.title: string broke at about a year
customer_reviews.text: nice toned chime. It sounds like "mars". very nice for the price! ****UPDATE***** 6.15.17. The string that holds the tube broke and either came off the small nail that holds it or the string broke. I noticed that there is a year warranty, and though this happened several months ago, I just had time to look it up in my past orders and found it. Of course it's out of warranty. Now I either have to fix it myself, or throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful aesthetically and musically
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful aesthetically and musically. Heaven to your ears. Great quality, particularly when compared to the other junk I got in the mail with it. *sigh* (This IS very nice. Pretty. Get one today :))
customer_reviews.author: 13beans

customer_reviews.title: Insanely nice wind chime!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chime! It's the perfect size, not too big and not too loud to piss off the neighbors. PERFECTLY tuned, nice and subtle. If you want a good hand-made wind chime, get this one! High quality made chime. Highly recommended and I will buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: numrious music
customer_reviews.text: we like chimes music when wind is blowing we listen the music it is interesting and soft music.Precision Tuned to Create The most Wonderful Music & Encore collection of Nice chimes and removable wind catcher.Thanks a Lot.
customer_reviews.author: R Sheraz Khan

customer_reviews.title: Small chimes, very sweet sound, NOT loud.
customer_reviews.text: The chimes are smaller than I expected, the 17 inch measurement is from top to bottom of the clapper and I expected it just to be the length of the chimes, but they have a very sweet sound. I wish they were a little louder - they hang outside the living room window and I could hear my previous set clearly from inside the house, but these are a lot fainter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chimes
customer_reviews.text: I really am enjoying listening to these chimes. They are loud enough to hear but not loud enough to be annoying to others that may not love chimes. I would have given it 5 stars but mine did not have the O ring that is described in the packaging. I know I could buy an O ring but I should not have to and I have no idea what size it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Delicate and beautiful sound. The song builds as you add more Woodstock chimes of the same family, i.e. mercury and mars. I plan to add more until i have the whole set!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Just love them
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and the sound. They were a bit smaller than I imagined but that’s just fine. I love hearing them and they make a beautiful addition to our back deck.
customer_reviews.author: Micha Proietto

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, light sound. Good brand.
customer_reviews.text: Have a few Woodstock chimes, and wanted just one more, so decided to stay with what I know. This is very nice, although it is not my favorite Woodstock. The reason is that the sound on this one is much higher and more "tinkly" than the others I had before. But variety is the spice of my life, and I suppose it's actually nice that they all have different sounds. It's also beautiful, and I expect the same long life from this one that I've enjoyed from my other Woodstock chimes. Another great hostess gift at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: SupaMom

customer_reviews.title: Sound great!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! They have such a nice mellow sound unlike the discordant, jumble of so many wind chimes out there. The color is a nice blue green and we're extremely happy with our purchase. The only downside is that the string is cloth instead of fishing-wire so as an outdoor item I don't expect them to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: East_coast_trials

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Produces nice and melodic for my back patio. Not overpowering or annoying, but is responsive to the slightest breeze. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: More ethereal beauty of sounds...
customer_reviews.text: My review is the same for this set as it was for the Polaris set. Knew they would be small, but the combined sound is simply lovely, especially when mixed with a slightly larger set of Woodstock chimes already in my possession. Just beautiful sounds. Take out a ruler and/or measuring tape before ordering so you know what you are getting, then order for the sheer beauty of their sound in the wind. Sometimes singularly, sometimes in unison... Always ethereal.
customer_reviews.author: L. Santackas

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great sounding chimes
customer_reviews.text: Very well made chimes that sound great. They are a bit loud but they have a nice, deep sound - not tinny and cheap like so many other chimes that are sold. They were a decent price and they look great on my patio.
customer_reviews.author: MurphysLaw

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart.
customer_reviews.text: The chime fell apart after two months. Not the quality as other chimes that I have purchased and much smaller than I expected. Now the chime will go in the garbage. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MJG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and melodious
customer_reviews.text: I have several wind chimes, but these are my favorite. I love to listen to them--their sound is distinctive from all of my other chimes. They are very well made and have held up well in strong windy storms.
customer_reviews.author: N Spivey

customer_reviews.title: beautiful wind chimes
customer_reviews.text: a tuned windchime, yeah right.....well it actually is! I hang several in my hosta garden to deter the deer from eating them all- and this one is the best quality and the chimes are really beautiful to listen to I highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Nice small chime with excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be but really nice sounding chime we have several my wife likes this one's best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Found these windchimes at a great price and bought two. Was planning to use them as gifts but that never happened. I took them out of the box and they made the sweetest sound I've heard from chimes in awhile. Looking forward to hearing this on a breezy day.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love Woodstock chimes! I have four different ones and all of them are quality made with beautiful melodic sounds. I have purchased this particular one four times. I’ve gifted three and kept one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiianmaiden

customer_reviews.title: Too loud, watch out for neighbors!!
customer_reviews.text: This chime is so loud & takes very little breeze to get going (which could be desirable to some folks). If you are living in an apartment complex with units too close to each other, then watch out for this chime coz your neighbors sure as hell won't appreciate your chime. Don't hang it in the patio if it gets lot of breeze. It is melodious & good quality, however not for everyone. Pay attention to the location & purpose behind getting the chime.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Chimes
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Although on the small side, the sounds are lovely. Sometimes smaller chimes have higher pitched sounds that can get annoying on occasion but I never get tired of listening to these chimes. Product is very nicely made and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tangerine

customer_reviews.title: Mom approved!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wind chime for my mom and she just loves it. She's always telling me it is just perfect and when I speak to her on the phone I can hear it in the background. Classy looking and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful wind chime
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely beautiful wind chime, nicest I have ever received. If this is a gift, you can have the wooden part at the end engraved. A gorgeous sound when the wind blows. Arrived so quickly, would absolutely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: patricia arbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pitch!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the quality and the tone of the "chimes of mars". Since i am a handbell and chime performer, the notes being on key was important. Will buy again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn H.

customer_reviews.title: Music to my ears.
customer_reviews.text: It is a little smaller thN I expected but I am still glad I bought it. I but it in the back yard and when a breeze hits it, the sound is beautiful. The construction and materials are quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this. Wonderful sound, well tuned. Pleasantly surprised at how loud it is for the size. Happy with the product. Will be buying more in the future to give as gifts, because it is a great value. I like this company, Woodstock, now. I will be hanging it outside to see how it endures our mild Southern California weather. I will update this review later, after I see how durable it is over time.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wind Chimes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. They have a beautiful sound! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Iverson

customer_reviews.title: The price is good. The size of the wind chime is not ...
customer_reviews.text: The price is good. The size of the wind chime is not too small or not to big. It can hang outside in the yard and the sound is very pleasant,and beautiful to hear. I like the sound very much . It just like a music to calm you down. I'm so glad to make a right choice to purchase this wind chime.
customer_reviews.author: Van Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Pretty natural look.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty natural look. Got my money's worth. The sound is pleasant and audible with a gentle breeze. Not so loud it's a problem for my next door neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: NIfty Betty

customer_reviews.title: Beauty is in the "Ear" of the Beholder
customer_reviews.text: Not the most beautiful chime set "visually" speaking (not that they look shabby or anything), but the "melodic" in-tune sounds they produce do make help compensate. (I may include a short video clip at some point)
customer_reviews.author: Ace-of-Stars

customer_reviews.title: Wish it chimed a little better.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful workmanship and has a lovely sound, if the wind blows heavy enough to get it moving. A little disappointed it takes so much to get the chimes to ring. Since it's hurricane season, I may get a chance yet!
customer_reviews.author: Britt Covington

customer_reviews.title: beautiful wind chimes
customer_reviews.text: beautiful chimes. Just be warned if you are into flying star feng shui that 5 tubed wind chimes can be dangerous to put in certain places. Green is also a particular color that can be dangerous to put against certain stars or areas. I'd almost never put these in the NE or SW portions of a house or office cube/room. I won't go into too much detail, as I'd have to write 2 large paragraphs worth of material to elaborate.
customer_reviews.author: bandazar

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chime for my back patio. I live in Las Vegas and all though we don't get a lot of wind when it does get windy it blows hard. Last night we had 60 mph gusts and the chimes are still hanging in perfect condition. They make a beautiful sounds matching the other one I bought named Mercury. I have purchased two more Pluto and Celtic and can't wait for them to get here. Should have done this sooner. They make the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Blair

customer_reviews.title: Really Sound Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pentatonic scale! They are pretty well made for 12.00. I hung them from a tree branch which shakes them a lot more than hanging in the patio so no issues with them not getting enough breeze to chime.
customer_reviews.author: Ouijah

customer_reviews.title: Melodious!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wind chimes...they are small and have a very nice sound. I find that the wind really needs to kick up to get them going but it's ok. Woodstock chimes are the best and these do not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Juliennes

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but only because I didn't read enough.
customer_reviews.text: Normally when I read the details on a product I am not surprised when I receive it. These wind chimes are smaller than what I expected. I thought the chimes themselves would be 17", but the 17" is from the tip of the string to the end of the wind catcher. I know this is my own fault and should have payed more attention to the details. With all that said, the chimes are nice and do make a nice sound. The string seems a little thin, but we will have to wait and see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm G

customer_reviews.title: these are great yard wind chimes
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are great yard wind chimes. Great lil chime in the wind. No breaking or falling apart through summer sunshine and rain. I've bought a few of these and have in my yard.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Woodstock Encore Collection Bronze Chimes Of Mars
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many windchimes over the years mostly purchased at local discount centers or dollar strores. Well, these are way different! The Woodstock chimes are excellent and made with high quality materials for long life and beauty. The one I got is a small one so don't expect a huge bone shaking chime. It is a pleasant high pitched and melodious song. I love it and you will too. The price point is way below the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Skyeye

customer_reviews.title: Rich sound & traditional beauty... for little money..
customer_reviews.text: I have seen this wind chime in boutique and garden shops for a lot more money. (whatever crazy price they can get). It is beautifully constructed, and solid. Opened out of the box easy. The chimes are mellow, rich, and beautiful sounding. We like to actually play with the chimes to make it sound. I keep in a room in the house near a window & door. I am glad that I really like it, and may purchase another to hang on our backyard tree, only since the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Martin

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, soft sounds
customer_reviews.text: These make awesome sounds. I actually couldn't believe it was the wind chimes at first, and was convinced someone was playing some instrument. The sound is loud and travels far, but it's a very soft, gentle sound, so that it doesn't bother you even at night. The chimes seem to be tuned in such a way that it always sounds like someone is playing a song, with planned notes and all that, rather than random movements.
customer_reviews.author: plin plin

customer_reviews.title: Not the best wind chime.
customer_reviews.text: Chimes are pretty but they Do not make very much noise even in a good breeze. I would not buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn R

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, just like we needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these windchimes for my entry door at my ice cream store as our old ones broke. These are noisy enough to hear at the rear of the store over multiple machines running. A bit of an annoying sound in that it keeps making noise long after the initial contact, but we do need to hear folks come through the door when we're in the back and not able to see people enter.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Belleville

customer_reviews.title: Magically beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these chimes. I have the entire collection on my wish list so I can complete the collection. They sound light and airy and most definitely musical. I have always hung wind chimes around my home but these are the best I have heard. Neighbors comment on them too. They are not loud but seem to drift on the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M Pollaro

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: very much smaller than I expected but I got it as a gift for a neighbor for christmas who loves them. He said he loves it and its loud but enjoys it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds and Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: For a small chime the sound is GREAT! A great addition to our patio!
customer_reviews.author: Freestyle

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: These chimes sound beautiful! I was afraid that the sound would scare off my hummingbirds but instead all birds appear indifferent to the sound. The hummingbirds even enjoy the red finish on the wood! I have these hung next to the Mercury Encore chimes and other Woodstock chimes and the sound is gentle, not overwhelming, even in a good breeze. Love these chimes!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Letourneau

customer_reviews.title: NICE SMALLER CHIME
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and a nice sound for a small chime.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: love these windchimes
customer_reviews.text: First let me say, the delivery was really nice. They came beautifully wrapped and not tangled. I immediately hung them outstide and luckily it is breezy today. The sound is beautiful. Not too loud, not too quiet, not too soft or harsh. They are just right. They have a very deep sound that seems to radiate. I love them. They are also very very pretty to look at. I would highly recommend these windchimes. YOu really can't find a better bargain out there.
customer_reviews.author: americancarol

customer_reviews.title: Nice chimes
customer_reviews.text: not as big as thought they would be. Pleasant sounding.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B. Blowers

customer_reviews.title: Really lovely and excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sound. Beautiful workmanship - the color of the tubes is lovely as is the wood. Yes, it's a smaller chime (around 17" end to end, total.) Small chime means a small "clapper" which means does mean that you'll need a larger wind for it to move. Just goes with the territory. It's gorgeous, tho. I bought it at the same time as the Woodstock Chimes Tudor Rose Windchime, Queen, which is really gorgeous. I recommend both.
customer_reviews.author: LittleReadBooks 'n' MoreTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Love Woodstock chimes!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound!!! I have the Pluto Woodstock chime and this mars Woodstock chime is a perfect pair!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chimes
customer_reviews.text: These chimes look and sound lovely. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Adele

customer_reviews.title: she opens the door and announces herself with a wonderful pentatonic chord
customer_reviews.text: Bought these chimes a year ago, mounted two pics of my granddaughter on the windcatcher, and hung it just inside the front door where a 5-year-old could reach it. Now, a year later, when she comes to visit, she opens the door and announces herself with a wonderful pentatonic chord. A family tradition in the making. Thank you, Woodstock. Peace. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Uncltodd

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was longer...
customer_reviews.text: The reason I didn't give 5 stars is that the bottom sections string was cut and I just retied and knotted and it's good as new. It's a little smaller than expected but that's on me....didn't measure. Otherwise I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bolt Bling

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: The item came in perfect condition and the sound was beautiful. My sister commented that it sounded like the Church:) will definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DIM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and makes beautiful sound. I've had this for over a year and it is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this chime, so do my kids. It sounds like a music box.
customer_reviews.author: msshopsalot

customer_reviews.title: Great value-- you can't find the same quality in stores
customer_reviews.text: Bought them in 2012 as a gift, now we're at the end of 2016 as of me writing this review and they are still holding up. Some fading on the wood from the Florida sun but given their age, it still looks nice, sounds nice, no rust. Overall for the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully constructed and lovely musical sound!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these as gifts, one for my daughter. She has a constant breeze, as her home sits on top of a mountain. The sound was constant yet not annoying at all. It has a gentle ring that is very soothing. The quality of the chime is excellent and visually beautiful. I wish I had more wind where I live to hear this chime. When I move soon, I'll get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Singing grandma

customer_reviews.title: Do not last long.
customer_reviews.text: I like these chimes but they did not even last a year before falling apart. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Report

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chimes
customer_reviews.text: This i probably one of the best chimes ive boughton in years
customer_reviews.author: silver god

customer_reviews.title: percussion chimes
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice chime, it was a bit smaller than I thought, the gong part is what is 17 inches, I was expecting the bells to be longer. they have a nice soft song to them, I have them hanging inside of my porch so they arent beaten to death in the elements. I also bought another set, its bigger, the song is stronger. I like the size of that one better, but both of them are perfect for their price. Id buy another set, but my husband is going nuts with my collection.
customer_reviews.author: L. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty and the sound is beautiful. At first I worried it would be too loud to enjoy but it’s soft and very nice. I purchased another one for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Iffy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tones. One of the better sounding wind-chimes in my garden. Was shipped very quickly and seems well-constructed.
customer_reviews.author: JayB

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a retirement gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice and has a pretty sound. It isn't very big, but the sound is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful chime - hung it up in the wind & ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful chime - hung it up in the wind & it is a pleasure to listen to. We get lots of wind in the monsoon season but it has already weathered 15 mph winds - a pleasure - quick service from a caring store
customer_reviews.author: D. Roller

customer_reviews.title: beautiful chime
customer_reviews.text: love the sound of mars it's beautiful music to the ears
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this windchime
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this windchime. The last one I bought and returned was too large. This one has a chime that will not bother my neibhbors by being so loud but chimes so I can hear it well. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: oldtime quilter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty look and sound.
customer_reviews.text: These sound beautiful. I have them hanging by the window so when the wind blows, the sound echoes inside the house and it is very pretty and soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: This medium sized chime has a rich tone and the bronze color is beautiful. The recipient of the gift was very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Can never go wrong with a Woodstock chime. This medium sized chime has a rich tone and the bronze color is beautiful. The recipient of the gift was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Cook

customer_reviews.title: Delightful!
customer_reviews.text: This Mars wind chime is delightful, as are all the Woodstock wind chimes I own.
customer_reviews.author: Micah's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Encore Windchimes
customer_reviews.text: Woodstock Encore produces exceptional products. This is my second set of Woodstock windchimes. I purchased this set for a vacation home. The chimes are tuned. The sounds from multiple chimes are harmonic. I have at both houses: Venus, Neptune, Earth, Mars, Mercury & Pluto. My only suggestion to Encore is to make a larger chime for even deeper tones. It gives my ramada areas very relaxing sounds.
customer_reviews.author: WWB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in my garden. I liked it so much that I decided I didn't want it to be weathered so I kept it inside. It's very well made and I love the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice indeed
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine and it's beautiful. The tone is nice and loud enough to hear indoors ( on patio). I was impressed with how well it was packaged. A great buy especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wind Chime
customer_reviews.text: I love how small and simple this wind chime is. Other wind chimes can get so expensive and too big. I wanted something small and quaint for my front porch and this wind chime has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SadieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I have these beautiful chimes hanging on my front porch arch
customer_reviews.text: I have these beautiful chimes hanging on my front porch arch. I chose the Chimes of Mars. The sound these make when the wind gently blows is soo calming. These are very well constructed and sturdy. My old windchimes bit the dust and this fit the bill perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

product_meta.title: Woodstock Chimes of Mars, Bronze- Encore Collection
product_meta.description: Color:BronzeIn music, the word Encore means more as called by an audience at the end of a concert. The Woodstock Encore collection chimes are designed to be more windchime in every way more colors, sizes and value. Each windchime is precisely hand tuned to a 5 note pentatonic scale. The pentatonic scale is particularly well suited to windchimes because all of the notes are harmonious. Any combination of Encore chimes will always play beautifully together, creating a rich soundscape.
feature_bullets: Rich bronze-color tubes and beautiful, uplifting harmonies from a small-size, classic-style wind chime tuned to a 5 note pentatonic scale
5 Bronze-colored aluminum tubes; bubinga-finish wood top and wind catcher; durable, braided nylon cord
The smallest, personal-sized chimes of mercury to the largest, deep-voiced chimes of neptune
All encore chimes sound beautiful together because the notes in their pentatonic scale are always in harmony, no matter how they are played
Measures 17-inches overall length ; 14-inches from the top wooden piece to the bottom of the wind catcher; longest tube is 8-inches
